ygData.subject: Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: has anyone noticed that the higher level you are, there ... start off it s ... up in lvl ... The game takes into account that you will probably be grouped at
ygData.messageBody:
has anyone noticed that the higher level you are, there
> is a difference in what cons you can kill? For example, when you
start off it's
> usually not to hard to kill things that con white but as you get
up in lvl
> sometimes even things that con blue can be hard.


The game takes into account that you will probably be grouped at
higher levels. But it can depend on class to. I know that as a
Ranger (supposedly a soloable char), I will get my butt kicked by
casters that con blue to me, but I can take pretty much anything
that's melee that cons drk blue to me and some that con white.
